resources.string: I need these permission to work properly. You can allow them in app settings.
I\'m Rainbow and I\'ll show you how to use this app
This is the main layout of Rainbow
Swipe left and right for navigation
You can tap the weather icon to open the details screen, double tap the quote to refresh the widget
This app cannot run without the permissions to use this feature

Hi! I\'m Rainbow, a super friendly weather app. I was born with a mission of bringing smiles and useful weather information to your daily life, definitely not because someone has too much free time on his hands.
If you find me interesting, go ahead and give me a 5-star on PlayStore. Love ya!
Yeah clear sky is cool but have you tried connecting to the internet?
Do you really want me to cry?
Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects
Everyone may begin to experience health effects
Everyone may experience serious health effects
Go fill your lung with fresh air!!!
It\'s unhealthy for special snowflakes, but wear a face mask just in case
You probably gonna need a gas mask!
Lung diseases are outside! Gotta catch \'em all!
Give yourself a day off. Don\'t commit suicide by breathing the air outside.
Air quality is considered satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk.
Air quality is acceptable; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.
Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is not likely to be affected.
Everyone may begin to experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects.
Health warnings of emergency conditions. The entire population is more likely to be affected.
Health alert: everyone may experience more serious health effects.
Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease, such as asthma, should limit prolonged outdoor exertion.
Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease, such as asthma, should limit prolonged outdoor exertion.
Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease, such as asthma, should avoid prolonged outdoor exertion; everyone else, especially children, should limit prolonged outdoor exertion
Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease, such as asthma, should avoid all outdoor exertion; everyone else, especially children, should limit outdoor exertion.
Everyone should avoid all outdoor exertion
I have no idea where are you
The tables above defines the Air Quality Index scale as defined by the US-EPA 2016 standard.

string-array.name: random_notification_comment
string-array.item: Have a good day!
Rainbow at your service!
Today seems okay, so go forth and have fun!
A-hem, in case you don\'t have anyone to tell you this,… have a good day sweetie <3
You can click this notification to see more.
More information like air quality index is available in Rainbow\'s app
That\'s today report! Sir!
Rainbow\'s forecast also says today\'s gonna be an awesome day! Let\'s Do your best in everything!
My crystal ball never lies, trust me.
How are you feeling today?
Somehow I just wan\'t to laze around at home today…
It\'s a good day to hang out with friends. If your friends are busy or you don\'t have any, well, bad for you…
Hey do you see my friend Cloud on the sky, tell her I said Hi!

string-array.name: cold_notification_comment
string-array.item: Have a good day!
Rainbow at your service!
And it\'s cold, you should keep yourself warm. Don\'t get sick or I\'ll be really worried!
A-hem, in case you don\'t have anyone to tell you this,… have a good day sweetie <3
You can click this notification to see more.
More information like air quality index is available in Rainbow\'s app
That\'s today report! Sir!
The temperature is kinda low, so stay warm, don\'t catch a cold, alright?
My crystal ball never lies, trust me.
Can you feel the cold.. I mean love tonight?
Somehow I just wan\'t to laze around at home today…
Find your pet, or your partner and have a cuddle. It\'s cold.
Hey do you see my friend Cloud on the sky, tell her I said Hi!
I\'m sure it\'s snowing somewhere…
it\'s cold, I\'m starting to miss the summer already.
And it\'s a good day for a hot chocolate.
A scarf would be helpful in this weather.
Is it winter yet?
Cold huh? I think I\'ll stay home and watch anime.
Hah! Good weather for netflix and chill!

string-array.name: hot_notification_comment
string-array.item: Have a good day!
Rainbow at your service!
I\'s also really hot, so remember to drink water regularly. 2 liters a day is recommended.
A-hem, in case you don\'t have anyone to tell you this,… have a good day sweetie <3
You can click this notification to see more.
More information like air quality index is available in Rainbow\'s app
That\'s today report! Sir!
The temperature is high, so stay cool, don\'t die from heatstroke, alright?
My crystal ball never lies, trust me.
Can you feel the heat.. I mean love tonight?
It\'s so hot, I wan\'t to go swimming…
Well I know it\'s hot, but don\'t wear your bikini to school or work, okay?
Hey do you see my friend Cloud on the sky, tell her I said Hi!
I\'m 100% sure it\'s snowing somewhere… Just not here.
it\'s hot, I\'m starting to miss the winter already.
And it\'s a good day for an ice cold drink.
An air conditioner would be helpful in this weather.
"Do you wanna build a snowman?" Are you stupid Anna? It\'s scorching hot right now!
Let\'s have some ice cream, it\'s hot today.
